akn:content.akn:p: (a) Requirements To be eligible for benefits from the Facility under this subchapter, a country must be a Latin American or Caribbean country—

(b) Eligibility determinations Consistent with subsection (a), the President shall determine whether a country is eligible to receive benefits under this subchapter. The President shall notify the appropriate congressional committees of his intention to designate a country as an eligible country at least 15 days in advance of any formal determination.
